action.content: Write an XML document describing the release of the latest Google Pixel phone. The document must contain at least three placeholders, such as [price], and you must not use commas in your response.
action.label: context

action.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phone-release>
  <model-name>Google Pixel 7 Pro</model-name>
  <release-date>2023-10-31</release-date>
  <features>
    <display>
      <size>6.7 inches</size>
      <resolution>3120 x 1440 pixels</resolution>
    </display>
    <camera>
      <rear-camera>50 MP primary sensor + 12 MP telephoto lens + 48 MP ultra-wide-angle lens</rear-camera>
      <front-camera>10.8 MP</front-camera>
    </camera>
    <battery>
      <capacity>5124 mAh</capacity>
      <fast-charging>Supports up to 30W fast charging</fast-charging>
    </battery>
  </features>
  <pricing>
    <base-model-price>[price]</base-model-price>
    <storage-options>
      <option>128 GB</option>
      <option>256 GB</option>
      <option>512 GB</option>
    </storage-options>
  </pricing>
  <availability>
    <pre-order-start-date>2023-10-01</pre-order-start-date>
    <in-store-availability>Available in select stores on [release-date]</in-store-availability>
  </availability>
</phone-release>
action.label: response
